summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Premium Navigation System and Parties module. All navigation features working correctly: Primary sidebar expands on hover showing Workspace/Solutions/Reports, Secondary sidebar expands showing Parties submodules, Solution dropdown allows switching between IB Commerce and IB Finance, Module tabs (Parties, Catalog, Revenue, Procurement, Governance) work with dropdowns.

minor.issue: 401 errors when accessing IB Finance module endpoints - likely missing backend routes for finance module

console_warnings.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

features: Shows Workspace, Solutions, Reports menu items with icons and text
Shows user profile with name and role
Collapses back to icons when mouse leaves
Shows Parties submodule items (Customers, Vendors, Partners, Channels, Profiles)
Shows module switcher at bottom (Parties, Catalog, Revenue, Procurement, Governance)
Active item highlighted with blue background
Solution selector dropdown (IB Commerce selected by default)
Module tabs with dropdowns (Parties, Catalog, Revenue, Procurement, Governance)
Search and Notifications icons on right
Shows all solutions: IB Commerce, IB Workforce, IB Operations, IB Capital, IB Finance
Switching to IB Finance navigates to /finance/cashflow/actuals
Active solution marked with blue dot
Stats cards: Total Parties (96), Active Parties (17), Customers (43), Vendors (42)
Module cards with stats for Customers, Vendors, Partners, Channels, Profiles
Recent Activity section showing latest party records
New Customer and New Vendor quick action buttons

critical_code_review_comments: VendorsList.jsx has React key prop warning - should add unique key to list items
IB Finance module returns 401 errors - backend routes may not be implemented yet

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All navigation features and Parties pages working)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Premium navigation system fully tested and working. Primary sidebar expands on hover showing Workspace/Solutions/Reports. Secondary sidebar shows Parties submodules. Solution dropdown allows switching between IB Commerce and IB Finance. All Parties submodule pages (Dashboard, Customers, Vendors, Partners, Channels, Profiles) load correctly with data. Module tabs in top nav work with dropdowns. Minor issue: VendorsList has React key warning. IB Finance module has 401 errors (backend not implemented).
